alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 7:13PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Fillmore and Thayer Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 713 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bruning, or 33 miles north of Belleville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Belvidere around 725 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hebron, Alexandria and Gilead. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
